sourcesContent: import {Component, OnInit} from '@angular/core'; import {CategoriesService} from "../services/categories.service"; @Component({ selector: 'app-categories', templateUrl: './categories.component.html', styleUrls: ['./categories.component.css'] }) export class CategoriesComponent implements OnInit{ constructor(private cs: CategoriesService) { } onSubmit(formData: any) { this.cs.saveData(formData); } // @ts-ignore categoryArray: Array
